law.catch_line: Each dealer who has applied for temporary registration plates under § 13-601 of this subtitle shall...

text.section: Each dealer who has applied for temporary registration plates under § 13-601 of this subtitle shall keep a record for 3 years of all temporary registration plates delivered to the dealer.
Each dealer who has applied for temporary registration plates under § 13-601 of this subtitle shall keep a record for 3 years of all temporary registration plates issued by the dealer.
Each dealer who has applied for temporary registration plates under § 13-601 of this subtitle shall keep a record for 3 years of any other relevant information that the Administration requires.
